Text:
igotyGOTH - you are a fucking ingrate.  Not only does kolll upload probably the *best* stuff on TPB, but in this case, he's taken the trouble to post a fix to a broken scene release.
What have you posted recently?

First of all, thanks for the fix, but can you tell me how to apply this fix in detail please.

Thanks so much!

igotGOTH: remember - I wasn't criticising the original uploader.
And yes, I have also upload to other sites.
I hope that when *you* upload, you get nice comments; just remember to leave nice comments for others.
If you are going to criticise, at least say 'Thanks' first.

Oh, and at least I have uploaded more than you to this site:
http://thepiratebay.org/user/igotGOTH

jenkinsgto:
Simply place these two .rar files in your original movie folder, and allow them to replace the original files.  Once done, extract the files and burn.
